property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses a number for X. Each player puts X cards from their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order, or their entire hand if they have less than X cards in it. Each player puts the top Y cards of their deck into their hand, where Y is the number of cards that player put on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the top X cards of your deck into your hand, where X is the number of cards you put on the bottom plus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, pick a character an opponent controls. It gains COVERT until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
While this card is a member of an attacking party, the party is COVERT.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card inflicts damage to a faction, that faction's controller puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck if they can.

property.name: Text
property.value:
TELEPORT
COST: Pay 4. Deplete this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal the top 7 cards of an opponent's deck. Put all tactics revealed this way into the void. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order. For the rest of the game, you may deploy tactics voided by this card as though they were in your hand without meeting their threshold.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
When this card enters play, put a token on the attached character.
The attached character gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
HANDOFF
COST: Pay 1. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE ELDRIDGE
At the start of your turn, you may pick 2 or fewer non-resource cards you control. If you do, put up to 2 tokens divided however you want on those cards.
EJECT
COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card. Pick a non-resource card.
EFFECT: Put the card into its owner's hand.
DISRUPT
COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may pick a character you control.
When this card enters play, if you picked a character as part of its cost, put 2 tokens on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick 2 or fewer characters.
This turn, the characters lose 1 speed. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, an opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, you may look at the top 2 cards of any one deck. If you do, put 1 card on the bottom of that deck and 1 card on the top. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an attacking or blocking party is formed including this card, it must have an even number of members.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
Put the resource into its owner's hand. You may play a resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each opponent's hand is revealed at all times.
DISAPPROVE
COST: Pay 2. Name a card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand. That player puts a card with the chosen name on the bottom of their deck if they can. If they do, that player draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent picks a non-resource card they control if they can. If they do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
DISRUPT
COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
RECALL
COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
EFFECT: Put the resource into it's owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character. X is its strength.
If that character's controller controls at least X face-down resources, destroy the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent discards a card. You may search your deck for a card of the same type as the discarded card and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card enters play, you may pick a tactic in your discard pile. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
LOBOTOMIZE
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose 2 or fewer non-resource cards in it. That player discards those cards. That player takes control of this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control an even number of characters, reduce the numeric cost of tactics you deploy by 1, to a minimum of 1.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn and not during a battle. Pick a character you control.
Destroy the character if you can. If you do, X is its numeric cost. Search your deck for a character with numeric cost X+3 or less and reveal it. You may deploy it for free. If you don't, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is destroyed by battle damage, an opponent discards their hand.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: muddler, lurker

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.
When this card leaves play, you may pick a non-resource card. If you do, put it into its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only in response to a card being deployed. (Playing a resource doesn't count.)
Terminate the card, but put it into its owner's hand instead of their discard pile. Its owner puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Destroy the character. An opponent draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: All your characters gain 1 life.

When this card is destroyed, put 5 Micromajig tokens into play under your control.

Destroy the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, that player reveals cards from the top of their deck until a character is revealed or no cards are left. If a character is revealed, players take turns bidding on the character (starting with the active player). Players cannot bid a number greater than the number of detached resources they control. Whichever player makes the winning bid pays that many resources and puts the character into play under their control. Shuffle all other revealed cards into their owners's deck.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pluck, grifter

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE PLUCK
The top card of your deck is revealed at all times.
BOTTOM DEAL
COST: Pay 1.
EFFECT: Put the top card of your deck on the bottom.
CHEAT
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may deploy it. (You can't play resources with this ability.)
CHANGE COSTUME
COST: Pay 3. Shuffle this card into its owner's deck.
EFFECT: Search your deck for a pluck card with a different name than this card and reveal it. Put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While an opponent controls an item, this card cannot be blocked by that player.

property.value:

property.value: When this card enters play, all your characters gain 1 strength this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an attacking party is formed including this character, all other soldier characters in that party gain 1 life this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
CONVINCE
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: This turn, all your soldier characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
CUNNING PLAN
COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to an opponent's faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick an opponent. Pick a character that player controls.
Inflict 2 damage to the character. If that player's faction has 15 influence or less, inflict 1 additional damage to the character. If that player's faction has 10 influence or less, inflict 1 damage to each character they control. If that player's faction has 5 influence or less, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick an attacking character you control.
If the character would assign battle damage to the blocking party during this battle, assign it to the target of the attack instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Inflict 1 damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may pick 2 or fewer characters.
When this card enters play, if you picked characters as part of its cost, inflict up to 5 damage divided however you want to those characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
CANNIBALIZE
COST: Destroy a character you control.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent deploys a tactic, inflict 2 damage to their faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character you control. X is its strength. Pick a character an opponent controls. Y is its strength.
Inflict X damage to that opponent's character and Y damage to your character simultaneously. If only 1 of the characters would be destroyed by this damage, remove it from the game instead. The surviving character gains all rules text of the removed character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNLOAD
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character or faction.
EFFECT: Inflict 3 damage to the character or faction. That faction's or character's controller takes control of this card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ULTIMATE SACRIFICE
COST: X is this card's strength. Destroy this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character gains 4 strength.
When damage is inflicted to the attached character, increase the amount by 2.
HANDOFF
COST: Pay 3. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is attacking a location, it gains 1 strength and cannot be blocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, inflict 1 damage to all characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only while you are being attacked.
Inflict up to 3 damage divided however you want to the attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: EXTRA COST: Deploy this only if an opponent's faction has 10 influence or less.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE WYRMFANG
When you attack, the controller of the faction or location you are attacking picks any number of characters they control. Those characters must block during this battle if they can, and only those characters can block.
